LanguageData.BS_Gnome.label: elf
LanguageData.BS_Gnome.description: Some claim that they were created to make toys in Santa's workshop, but their unremarkable affinity for crafting indicate otherwise.\nThat said, they can tame a reindeer faster than you can say Now, DASHER! now, DANCER! now, PRANCER and VIXEN! On, COMET! on CUPID! on, DONNER and BLITZEN!
